oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ricky Skaggs Live at the Lone Star Cafe Show -- 1981-07-19
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from the Lonestar Cafe live show. The tape features a live performance of Ricky Skaggs (musician). The Lonestar Cafe show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Skaggs is from July 19, 1981.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ricky Skaggs
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Mike Fitzgerald greets the crowd and introduces Ricky Skaggs -- (01:00) Heartbroke (Ricky Skaggs) -- (04:12) Sweet Temptation (Ricky Skaggs) -- (06:56) Crying My Heart Out Over You (Ricky Skaggs) -- (10:01) Skaggs greets the crowd -- (11:13) Baby I'm in Love With You (Ricky Skaggs) -- (13:45) Skaggs asks for water -- (14:35) Don't Step Over an Old Love (Ricky Skaggs) -- (18:31) Swing Y'all (Ricky Skaggs) -- (21:38) I'll Take the Blame (Ricky Skaggs) -- (24:43) Skaggs reflects on "I'll Take the Blame" and performs a WHN radio spot -- (25:26) Could You Love Me One More Time (Ricky Skaggs) -- (28:14) Skaggs thanks the crowd -- (29:00) You May See Me Walkin' (Ricky Skaggs) -- (31:32) Skaggs performs a WHN radio spot, and Skaggs asks what people from Ashland, Kentucky were doing at the show -- (32:12) Don't Get Above Your Raisin' (Ricky Skaggs) -- (38:10) Skaggs discusses an issue off mic -- (38:32) One Way Rider (Ricky Skaggs) -- (45:35) Too Bad She's Gone (Ricky Skaggs) -- (50:34) Sally Goodin (Ricky Skaggs) -- (58:35) Fitgerald praises Skaggs, and Skaggs shows his appreciation -- (59:59) Talk About Suffering (Ricky Skaggs) -- (1:02:43) Low and Lonely (Ricky Skaggs) -- (1:05:37) Skaggs and Fitzgereld say goodbye
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Skaggs, Ricky; Fitzgereld, Mike;
